title: 02/06 Fantasy Football Podcast: SB52 Thoughts, AFC/NFC North Offseason Intrigue
description:
Jamey is back to tell us about Minneapolis and being on-hand for one of the best Super Bowls ever. We talk about the game, the controversial TD catches, benching Malcolm Butler and much more ... Offseason intrigue for PIT (16:25), CIN (20:15), CLE (22:00) and BAL (25:23). A lot of WR talk, and will BAL trust Alex Collins next season? ... We also discuss GB (29:10), DET (33:28), MIN (37:32) and CHI (39:44). Would an improved running game hurt or help Matthew Stafford? We also give you a salary cap primer (47:15) as we take your voicemails ... Your emails at fantasyfootball@cbsi.com
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
  
 Learn more about your ad choices. Visit https://podcastchoices.com/adchoices
